key: It's late I should go to sleep.
original: It's late I should go to sleep.

key: Such a beautiful slice of meat,  I can't wait to know how it tastes.
original: Such a beautiful slice of meat,  I can't wait to know how it tastes.
translation: 真是条小鲜肉，馋得我都流口水了。

key: I'm screwed! I don't know what she would do to me. Better get out before it's too late.
original: I'm screwed! I don't know what she would do to me. Better get out before it's too late.
translation: 吓坏我了！天知道她会对我做什么，赶快开溜！

key: What is this? She's too strong!
original: What is this? She's too strong!
translation: 怎么搞的？她怎么这么强！

key: Ugh... Her tough is a bit cold.
original: Ugh... Her tough is a bit cold.

key: This slippery and... cold... It's so good...
original: This slippery and... cold... It's so good...

key: Looks like the dish is ready. Let's see how it tastes.
original: Looks like the dish is ready. Let's see how it tastes.

key: Ahh... Her mouth is so cold.
original: Ahh... Her mouth is so cold.

key: My dick is so numb... I can feel my strength is leaking out.
original: My dick is so numb... I can feel my strength is leaking out.
translation: 我小鸡鸡好麻……感觉力气都被吸走了……

key: This is bad! I should struggle and get out of here before I couldn't hold it anymore.
original: This is bad! I should struggle and get out of here before I couldn't hold it anymore.
translation: 不好，我得赶快想办法离开这儿

key: Press \c[1]Left Arrow\c[0] or \c[1]Right Arrow\c[0] to struggle.
original: Press \c[1]Left Arrow\c[0] or \c[1]Right Arrow\c[0] to struggle.
translation: 按\c[1]左箭头\c[0]与\c[1]右箭头\c[0]挣扎

key: I will keep you as my food supply.
original: I will keep you as my food supply.
translation: 你以后就是我的口粮了。

key: You will be staying here forever.
original: You will be staying here forever.

key: I better prepare myself, as there is school today!
original: I better prepare myself, as there is school today!
translation: 赶快收拾收拾，该去学校了！

key: Used for hoeing or destroying seeds.
original: Used for hoeing or destroying seeds.

key: Used for removing grasses or crops.
original: Used for removing grasses or crops.
translation: 用来除掉杂草或收割庄稼

key: Used for planting seeds or harvesting.
original: Used for planting seeds or harvesting.

key: \c[12]Sleep after you change the day. \c[2]Bug free if you don't.
original: \c[12]Sleep after you change the day. \c[2]Bug free if you don't.
translation: \c[12]修改日期后记得睡一觉。\c[2]不然可能出bug。

key: Can only use this cheat after the First School Day event.
original: Can only use this cheat after the First School Day event.
translation: 只有在去过学校后才能使用作弊功能

key: I need to change back to my casual clothes before leaving.
original: I need to change back to my casual clothes before leaving.
translation: 走之前我得先换回日常穿着

key: It's already midnight. I should probably go to bed.
original: It's already midnight. I should probably go to bed.
translation: 已经午夜了，我该去睡觉了

key: Do you think I can time travel?
original: Do you think I can time travel?

key: No need to guess who they are!
original: No need to guess who they are!
translation: 不用猜都知道是谁放的！

key: How did they sneak into my room?
original: How did they sneak into my room?
translation: 他们什么时候溜进我房间的？

key: Our treat for this \c[30]Halloween\c[0] is \c[10]25% OFF\c[0], ONLY UNTIL MIDNIGHT!
original: Our treat for this \c[30]Halloween\c[0] is \c[10]25% OFF\c[0], ONLY UNTIL MIDNIGHT!

key: I've saved their number anyway. Not hurt to make a call.
original: I've saved their number anyway. Not hurt to make a call.
translation: 先记下号码好了，有空再打电话
我挺好奇他们会卖什么

key: It always stops at the scene where \C[20]Mae\C[0] takes me to watch her parents have sex and then she plays with my dick.
original: It always stops at the scene where \C[20]Mae\C[0] takes me to watch her parents have sex and then she plays with my dick.
translation: 每次都梦到\C[20]小梅\C[0]带我去看她父母做爱，然后她开始玩我的小鸡鸡

key: I feel like I forgot a lot of things since I left here to go to the city with my mom.
original: I feel like I forgot a lot of things since I left here to go to the city with my mom.
translation: 感觉从我和妈妈离开这里去城里住后忘掉了好多东西

key: Man, \C[25]Aunt Douie\C[0] is so hot. I would love to see them live action again.
original: Man, \C[25]Aunt Douie\C[0] is so hot. I would love to see them live action again.
translation: 说真的，\C[25]杜伊阿姨\C[0]身材真辣啊。真想再看看他们做爱的样子。

key: They do it very loudly and can hear it from several miles away.
original: They do it very loudly and can hear it from several miles away.
translation: 他们每次做爱动静都特别大，隔老远都听得到

key: Fortunately, their house is far from residential areas.
original: Fortunately, their house is far from residential areas.

key: I wonder if they will do that tonight.
original: I wonder if they will do that tonight.
translation: 不知道他们今晚会不会做

key: They always do it every night, I and \C[20]Mae\C[0] sometimes watch them do it back then.
original: They always do it every night, I and \C[20]Mae\C[0] sometimes watch them do it back then.
translation: 他们每晚都做，\C[20]小梅\C[0]有时会看个正着。

key: I should go there at \c[20]10 PM\c[0].
original: I should go there at \c[20]10 PM\c[0].
translation: 我应该\c[20]晚上10点\c[0]过去看看

key: I don't think I've fuck \C[20]Mae\C[0] back then.
original: I don't think I've fuck \C[20]Mae\C[0] back then.
translation: 我可不记得那时候有和\C[20]小梅\C[0]做爱过

key: We did a few times after that.
original: We did a few times after that.
translation: 之后我们又做了好几次

key: Her dad/\C[2]Mr. Carter\C[0] didn't let us play together anymore because we were too close.
original: Her dad/\C[2]Mr. Carter\C[0] didn't let us play together anymore because we were too close.
translation: 他爸\C[2]卡特先生\C[0]感觉我们走得太近，之后都不怎么让我们一起玩了

key: If he knew what we did. Maybe it wasn't that simple.
original: If he knew what we did. Maybe it wasn't that simple.
translation: 要是他知道我们干了什么，恐怕就不止这么简单了

key: Damn! I must clean it quickly.
original: Damn! I must clean it quickly.

key: Now I know why \C[20]Mae\C[0] always makes fun of me.
original: Now I know why \C[20]Mae\C[0] always makes fun of me.
translation: 现在我知道为什么\C[20]小梅\C[0]老是捉弄我了

key: Mom is probably in the city right now.
original: Mom is probably in the city right now.
translation: 妈妈现在大概已经进城了吧

key: She left and I didn't even notice.
original: She left and I didn't even notice.

key: Maaaannn... How am I still so tired!?
original: Maaaannn... How am I still so tired!?
translation: 老天……我怎么还是这么累？！

key: I feel like I just ran ten laps around the school.
original: I feel like I just ran ten laps around the school.
translation: 感觉刚跑了一千米似的

key: I've heard that people sometimes move around while dreaming...
original: I've heard that people sometimes move around while dreaming...
translation: 我好像听见有人在走来走去……

key: Especially since I don't think I've had any wet dreams for 7 days now
original: Especially since I don't think I've had any wet dreams for 7 days now
translation: 我可是一周都没梦遗过了

key: I'm gonna keep watch tonight, and figure this out.
original: I'm gonna keep watch tonight, and figure this out.
translation: 今晚不睡了，看看到底是什么情况

key: I'll buy a \c[14]Coffee\c[0]\i[238] to make sure I stay awake!
original: I'll buy a \c[14]Coffee\c[0]\i[238] to make sure I stay awake!
translation: 我得去买杯\c[14]咖啡\c[0]\i[238]，这样就不会睡着了

key: I need to go to the \c[1]Convenience Store\c[0]!
original: I need to go to the \c[1]Convenience Store\c[0]!

key: \c[21]You can access Quest Logs by 'A' key or through Menu
original: \c[21]You can access Quest Logs by 'A' key or through Menu
translation: \c[21]你可以按'A'键打开任务列表，或在游戏菜单里看

key: Kinda scary, but can't complain tho, hehe.
original: Kinda scary, but can't complain tho, hehe.
translation: 有点吓人，但这样正好，嘿嘿

key: Better hurry, they're waiting for me downstair.
original: Better hurry, they're waiting for me downstair.
translation: 赶快赶快，他们在楼下等我。
